Package com.example.hive.Controllers

Class ImageController

java.lang.Object
com.example.hive.Controllers.FirebaseController
com.example.hive.Controllers.ImageController
public class ImageController extends FirebaseController
Controller class to get and store images. Extends FirebaseController for db access, and utilizes Firebase Storage reference to get and store images.
Author:
Zach
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • saveImage

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<android.util.Pair<String,String>> saveImage(android.content.Context context, android.net.Uri path, String typeOfImage)
      Method to store a new image in Firebase Storage. Limits size of image to 10MB so as to not run out of storage in firebase.
      Parameters:
      context - The context from which this method was called
      path - The URI path to the image on device
      typeOfImage - What the image is used for - valid types are:
      • event poster
      • profile picture
      Returns:
      Task that completes with a string which is the download URL of the image. Store this in the event or profile document in firestore.

    • getAllImagesFromDB

      public void getAllImagesFromDB(com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<ArrayList<HashMap<String,String>>> callback)
      Function to retrieve all images from firestore
      Parameters:
      callback - The function to be called once all data has been retrieved

    • updateImageRef

      public void updateImageRef(String imgID, String otherID)
      Update image document with ID imgID to store reference to whatever document this image is for
      Parameters:
      imgID - String: document ID of image
      otherID - String: document ID of firebase document where this image is used

    • deleteImageAndUpdateRelatedDoc

      public void deleteImageAndUpdateRelatedDoc(String url, String imgID, String relatedDocID, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Boolean> callback)
      Handle deletion of image. Utilizes multiple helper functions to do so.
      Parameters:
      url - String: the download URL of the image
      imgID - String: the document ID of the image in firestore
      relatedDocID - String: the document ID of the firestore document where this image is used
      callback - OnSuccessListener: the function to be called once all deletion is performed

    • deleteImage

      private com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> deleteImage(String url, String imgID)
      Private method to delete the image from cloud storage, and the reference document in firestore
      Parameters:
      url - String: the download URL of the image
      imgID - String: the document ID of the firestore document that holds information about this image
      Returns:
      A Task to keep track of when deletion completes

    • handleRelatedDocument

      private void handleRelatedDocument(String relatedDocID, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Boolean> callback)
      Handles removal of the download URL from related document
      Parameters:
      relatedDocID - String: the document ID of the document that uses the iamge
      callback - OnSuccessListener: the function to be called once deletion is done

    • updateEventDocument

      private void updateEventDocument(String docID, com.google.firebase.firestore.CollectionReference eventCollection, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Boolean> callback)
      Removes the download URL from event document.
      Parameters:
      docID - String: the document ID of the event document
      eventCollection - CollectionReference: the reference to the events collection in firestore
      callback - OnSuccessListener: function to be called once deletion is complete

    • updateUserDocument

      private void updateUserDocument(String docID, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Boolean> callback)
      Removes the download URL from user document.
      Parameters:
      docID - String: the document ID of the user document
      callback - OnSuccessListener: function to be called once deletion is complete
